sn12.63:1.2: “cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāya.
sn12.63:1.4: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.
sn12.63:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāya.
sn12.63:2.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dve jāyampatikā parittaṃ sambalaṃ ādāya kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjeyyuṃ.
sn12.63:2.4: Atha kho tesaṃ, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ jāyampatikānaṃ kantāragatānaṃ yā parittā sambalamattā, sā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya.
sn12.63:2.6: Atha kho tesaṃ, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ jāyampatikānaṃ evamassa:
sn12.63:2.7: ‘amhākaṃ kho yā parittā sambalamattā sā parikkhīṇā pariyādiṇṇā.
sn12.63:2.9: Yannūna mayaṃ imaṃ ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ vadhitvā vallūrañca soṇḍikañca karitvā puttamaṃsāni khādantā evaṃ taṃ kantārāvasesaṃ nitthareyyāma, mā sabbeva tayo vinassimhā’ti.
sn12.63:2.10: Atha kho te, bhikkhave, dve jāyampatikā taṃ ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ vadhitvā vallūrañca soṇḍikañca karitvā puttamaṃsāni khādantā evaṃ taṃ kantārāvasesaṃ nitthareyyuṃ.
sn12.63:2.11: Te puttamaṃsāni ceva khādeyyuṃ, ure ca paṭipiseyyuṃ:
sn12.63:3.2: api nu te davāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyuṃ, madāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyuṃ, maṇḍanāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyuṃ, vibhūsanāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyun”ti?
sn12.63:3.4: “Nanu te, bhikkhave, yāvadeva kantārassa nittharaṇatthāya āhāraṃ āhāreyyun”ti?
sn12.63:3.6: “‘Evameva khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kabaḷīkāro āhāro daṭṭhabbo’ti vadāmi.
sn12.63:3.7: Kabaḷīkāre, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte pañca kāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hoti.
sn12.63:3.8: Pañca kāmaguṇike rāge pariññāte natthi taṃ saṃyojanaṃ yena saṃyojanena saṃyutto ariyasāvako puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyya.
sn12.63:4.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā kuṭṭañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya. Ye kuṭṭanissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.
sn12.63:4.3: Rukkhañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye rukkhanissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.
sn12.63:4.4: Udakañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye udakanissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.
sn12.63:4.5: Ākāsañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye ākāsanissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.
sn12.63:4.6: Yaṃ yadeva hi sā, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye tannissitā pāṇā te naṃ khādeyyuṃ.
sn12.63:4.8: Phasse, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātā honti.
sn12.63:4.9: Tīsu vedanāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
sn12.63:5.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā puṇṇā aṅgārānaṃ vītaccikānaṃ vītadhūmānaṃ.
sn12.63:5.3: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
sn12.63:5.4: Tamenaṃ dve balavanto purisā nānābāhāsu gahetvā taṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍheyyuṃ.
sn12.63:5.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa ārakāvassa cetanā ārakā patthanā ārakā paṇidhi.
sn12.63:5.8: ‘imañcāhaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ papatissāmi, tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigacchāmi maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhan’ti.
sn12.63:5.10: Manosañcetanāya, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte tisso taṇhā pariññātā honti.
sn12.63:5.11: Tīsu taṇhāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
sn12.63:6.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, coraṃ āgucāriṃ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṃ:
sn12.63:6.3: ‘ayaṃ te, deva, coro āgucārī, imassa yaṃ icchasi taṃ daṇḍaṃ paṇehī’ti.
sn12.63:6.5: ‘gacchatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ pubbaṇhasamayaṃ sattisatena hanathā’ti.
sn12.63:6.11: ‘gacchatha, bho, taṃ purisaṃ majjhanhikasamayaṃ sattisatena hanathā’ti.
sn12.63:6.17: ‘gacchatha, bho, taṃ purisaṃ sāyanhasamayaṃ sattisatena hanathā’ti.
sn12.63:6.20: api nu so puriso divasaṃ tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvediyethā”ti?
sn12.63:6.21: “Ekissāpi, bhante, sattiyā haññamāno tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvediyetha;
sn12.63:6.22: ko pana vādo tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno”ti.
sn12.63:6.24: Viññāṇe, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte nāmarūpaṃ pariññātaṃ hoti, nāmarūpe pariññāte ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmī”ti.
